channel.title: Run-Server problem
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I have this problem with run-server,i added mysql to my server And made it so you have to register on a website to play the server.
But i came across a problem,it worked but when i compiled i got no errors, but when i run my server it doesnt show the normal things, it just shows a flashing cursor and no more.
Anybody know the problem?
(P.S i removed the update but it still remains the same.)

item.title: Run-Server problem
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

I’m pretty sure i dont want to start my server again.
It’ll take about 2 weeks maybe?

Read full topic

item.title: Run-Server problem
item.dc:creator: @MasterHelper MasterHelper
item.description:
@MasterHelper wrote:

Maybe you should just start all over again and go through each step as you go along. It always helps me out when im stuck.

Read full topic
